intro: Welcome to Avax rent a car! We are a Croatian car rental company offering our services in over 40 locations across the country. We offer car rental service in all major cities and airports: Zagreb, Split, Dubrovnik, Zadar, Å ibenik, Opatija, Rijeka and Korcula Island. Renting a car is the perfect way to discover Croatia's wonderful history, culture and natural wonders. Explore our website for maps, resources and tips to help you plan your driving holiday. We offer the best rates of all cars hire companies in Croatia and all quotations are fully inclusive of taxes and insurance. Our friendly staff will be happy to send you on your way with directions to a great driving experience, guaranteed to make your Croatia vacation rewarding and relaxing.
